summary: Adds a diverse range of literature to the world of Skyrim. For those of you that enjoyed the in game books and want more.
descriptionHtml:
The Elder Scrolls Book Project.

This project aims to add a diverse range of literature to The Elder Scrolls universe. The mod will be presented in such a way that transfer to future TES titles will be easy (hence ‘TES Book Project’ and not ‘Skyrim Book Project’.

The mod adds the books to areas where such books would be likely to be found, for example virtually all books will be available in Apocrypha and most in the Arcanaeum, Children\'s stories and fantasy novels in family homes as well as appearing in random places through leveled lists.

The collection will include the following genres and hopefully many more as it grows;
- Folk tales (both original and existing that can be made ‘lore friendly’ or ‘neutral’ by which i mean giving no specifics such as place names that conflict with lore). 
- Horror
- Adult
- Adventure 
- Fantasy (fantasy tales that an author from Tamriel would create) 
- Journals 
- Children\'s stories

The following titles are completed works included in the mod;
(none)
The following titles are current works in progress (titles are working titles);
- From bones - Horror/fantasy that follows the novice years of a necromancer (0%).
- Tidilik - Folk/children\'s tale about a giant frog that drinks all the water (0%).
-
author: Liara7LF
